name: Derecho
description: Wind metamagic; before attacking, declare a path starting from target foe’s space up to two spaces long that moves away from this unit. Mt +2 in combat if this path would cause a collision (target foe’s allies are considered obstructions). On hit, move target foe along this path. @{const}{variant}{Cutting Gale Variant:} Collision Mt and Path Length +1. As target foe exits a space, a Wind Torrent is created in that space for two turns.
